g.text: commands in parallel on multiple repositories.
Print the full help menu along with usage examples.
Output a manifest of all git repositories found under a given path.
Git command to call for all repos found under the root
Options and arguments to pass with the git command
Path to a git repository, to a directory with one or more git
repositories, or to a git repository containing one or more git
Path or glob expression of a repository to include into the manifest.
Paths and glob expressions must be either absolute or relative to the
directory. Note that this option can be passed
multiple times in order to provide multiple paths to include from the
Path or glob expression of a repository to include into the manifest.
set a timeout for command after which all unfinished parallel
Whether or not to display output in a pager.
